title: Internship opportunities
content:

Are you currently enrolled in a Dutch or European study program such as Advertising, Business Economics, Marketing, Communications, PR, or Arts - linked studies (HBO/University level) with a working internship semester? Come and join us to develop your practical skills and gain some valuable work experience!
We are hiring new interns from January 2024 onwards across our different departments: Account Management, Public Relations, Creative, Design studio, Finance and Strategy.
